Articles.Content: which silly mod unstickied this?
Any good truly 24/7 servers yet?
I'm impressed! This is indubitably the most wanted thing on the forum. Great work!

Any good truly 24/7 servers yet?

Our server has been just updated to 0.1.1.3!

Please dont try to join with older versions as it might crash the server

For all people unable getting on our server: we saw that bug few times, where something crashed server, and after autorestart people couldnt get in, until i restarted server by hand. Strange, but its alpha.

i hope this is fixed in 0.1.1.3.

Go check the (only, or one of few) trully 24/7 server (in my signature)

If you cant get past handshake after being kicked (or crashed), try restarting KSP

Edited November 2, 2013 by Luxmaster-CZ
Just got an idea! SPACE BATTLES!!

Just got an idea! SPACE BATTLES!!

yeah, and with mods like lazor systems, with laser and missile packs!!

you could do battle tournaments, putting rovers on minmus with hyperedit then all sync and then do a deadmach!!

Not just space battles!

Get out your rovers for some robot-wars and get out your jets for some collision-based air combat.

It may not be effective, but it will be Kerbal.

hmm i actually see all the ships as a triangles for a while when connected and synced, but i can't switch to them, and when i fly Jeb i also can see those ships, and then they disappear i run both server both client in administrator mode. Before playing with my friends I just want to be able to send a ship to orbit, disconnect change the name and board that ship, but it seems i cant
yeah, and maybe do some landing leg-based arm for ramming and flipping rovers over... it would be amazing in a low-grav environnement!

Version: 0.1.1.2

Port: 2076

Num Players: 8/50

Players: Dimmy, lojoey

Information: KMP test server

Updates per Second: 60

Inactive Ship Limit: 20

Screenshot Height: 256

Screenshot Save: True

but there only 2 players! not 8! is it a bug?

Yes -- it's something I see quite regularly on my server. It's a ghosting issue of some sort where resources allocated for users aren't freed up.
Server updatet to 1.1.3!
anybody knows why i cant see my buddy in the game? only in the menu i can see his name but nothing more...
Yafme: Are you out of the 40km bubble?
Every time i try to log on to a server it works... mostly until i am disconected, this happens with all servers.

Anyone willing to test out my server please pm me. Tested thanks Max and Karo. Sorry it didn't go better hopefully the modder can iron some things out.

Also Thanks For this mod.

I Think Mods should make this Sticky!
ermagerd this is amazing

I would like to reiterate what Luxmaster sez, if you join a server make sure you're running latest client version!

Area-51

ksp.zone-51.org:2076

http://ksp.zone-51.org:88

problems with 0.1.1.3

- Still some random disconnects

- Users running older versions of client cause server instability

- Still some weird warp effects when you reach 40km from ksc

- If you lose your connection and just try reconnecting, you don't see anybody or the game universe.

You need to close KSP completely to be able to load the server's universe and see the other players.
Can you please make that people with older versions cant connect to server? That would be awesome
or put version from client behind each player for the /list command!

I try to create a server. I tried to change the ip but I don`t know the command.

/set [key] [value] is what I think it is.

so what I need to write to [key]?

please help
The key is the name of the variable.

I try to create a server. I tried to change the ip but I don`t know the command.

/set [key] [value] is what I think it is.

so what I need to write to [key]?

please help

"[key]" is the variable you are changing, in this case, you want to change the "ipBinding" variable. So type: /set ipBinding [iNSERT IP ADRESS HERE] without the "[]"

Regards,

Deejay
